debutant: Go to the forehand to draw them out of position and then go back backhand, forcing awkward shots
Go to the middle and wide backhand (as well as forehand) to force even more awkward shots
Keep the ball deep so their backhands aren't so strong
Give them shots that their backhand isn't so strong against (heavy topspin, heavy backspin, quick shots, etc.)
Throw them off with varied pace
Use serve and receive to dominate rallies so they don't get to use their strong backhand
